It's okay to not be okay. But if you are #livingwithdepression, your condition can often be misinterpreted as just mood swings. What do you usually say when people ask you what’s wrong? https://t.co/TUwN7iZQaH

#LivingWithDepression can feel like wearing glasses with grey lenses. But remember that the colours can come back: 
https://t.co/OEYMO6Zzrk

@X_P3T3R918_X Dear @X_P3T3R918_X. We are truly sorry to hear that you feel this way. Those thoughts are not uncommon when living with depression. Please reach out and talk to your doctor or someone you trust, and please take good care of yourself.

Getting out of bed and taking that morning shower can give you a burst of energy to tackle #depression head-on. When #livingwithdepression, remember to celebrate your daily victories – even the small ones. #RethinkDepression https://t.co/V9xmUxihyn
: https://t.co/NXVaid19og

@LiamSmi24604200 @SickNotWeak Dear @LiamSmi24604200. We're truly sorry to hear that you feel this way. We understand how hard socializing can be if you are living with depression. Do you have someone you trust you can talk to? Please take good care of yourself.

https://t.co/jeoi…
Gah -- forgot to include Predictit chart 4/ https://t.co/CvHhYG0QQf
And the reason it will look foolish is because it is. The big problem with Biden is that he really doesn't seem to get what has happened to the GOP over the past 25 years 3/

Here's why I think this may be bad for Biden: if Trump is impeached, as now seems very likely, but almost all Republicans then vote to acquit, his insistence that Trump is the whole problem and there are lots of good Rs will look foolish 2/

For what it's worth, prediction markets think Ukraine has boosted Warren against Biden. (Maybe not worth much: Yang with more chance than Sanders or Harris? Really?) They may be right — but NOT because there's any actual Biden scandal 1/
So Warren-hatred isn't about the threat to the haters' net worth; it's about the threat to their egos. Are they so petty that this will induce them to support a treasonous autocrat? Of course 8/

And Warren is completely explicit: while she isn't anti-capitalist, she has built her political career on the (true) proposition that at least some great fortunes aren't just rewards for magnificent social contributions, but the result of predation and exploitation 7/

overthinking killed my happiness,
insecurites killed my self esteem,
lies killed my trust.
I act like I'm such a strong person but I'm really not.
i'm sensitive, i over think every little thing, and i care way too much.
Trying not to cry when your around a bunch of people is literally the worst thing.
I don't give a shit who you are, you have no right to make someone feel worthless. Just to make yourself feel better!
when you’re ignored by someone whose attention means the most to you, is the worst feeling. you start to over think and it eats away at you.
Two things define you. Your patience when you have nothing, and your attitude when you have everything.
the worst thing about falling to pieces is that humans can do it so quietly.
I forgive a lot, but I never forget what's said and done!
Just because the scars have healed, doesn't mean that the pain has.

Do you have any other questions? Reply to this thread and we'll be happy to assist! 

We can't thank you enough for your love and support that has gotten us this far. Now we're here and ready to help the world!

Q: I want to host a show or other event to benefit Dropkick Depression, how do I do that? 

A: Super simple really! You can reach out to us at projects@dropkickdepression.com!

Q: Can I work for Dropkick Depression?

A: We are always looking for volunteers to help make Dropkick Depression a better place. If you think you have a skill that could help us make the world a better place, please reach out to contact@dropkickdepression.com

Q: Are you still going to have professional wrestling shows? 

A: Of course! We're super excited that 2020 looks like it'll have even more shows than 2019! Information on those will be coming soon. Working on getting our schedule worked out as we speak!

Q: Can I find any of this information on your website? 

A: Of course! Head on over to https://t.co/BD6LLqsjXF to see full details of our programs, financials, and staff members!

Today, September 10, is the annual World Suicide Prevention Day. This year, World Suicide Prevention Day focuses on the theme of “Working Together to Prevent Suicide,” to emphasize that mental health care and suicide prevention is incumbent on us all. https://t.co/mNyJ9Q43Cl

In light of the very sad news about Saoirse Kennedy Hill, we wanted to remind people that depression and mental health issues affect millions of people each year. If you or a loved one need support, please contact the National Suicide Prevention Hotline at 1-800-273-8255.

Beautiful story that dispels myths.  Depression is not grief.  Suicides rise in spring, not during the winter, as opposed to popular belief. If you or someone you love is in crisis, call the National Suicide Prevention Hotline at 1-800-273-8255 https://t.co/XSXrROShgF

I’m so so so sorry everyone. I will work hard on getting back to everyone hopefully by tomorrow night! (It’s 8:30pm where I am) - I have been trying to take summer to focus on myself and my happiness. But I’m getting back on this account hopefully.
